# Set up Codespaces for working with Quarto

## Install the Quarto CLI
Install the Quarto CLI from [tarball](https://quarto.org/docs/download/tarball.html).

At the Terminal

1. Get the files  
`wget https://github.com/quarto-dev/quarto-cli/releases/download/v1.5.57/quarto-1.5.57-linux-amd64.tar.gz`

2. Extract Files

Extract the contents of the tarball to a location where you typically install software (e.g. ~/opt). 

`mkdir ~/opt`
`tar -C ~/opt -xvzf quarto-1.5.57-linux-amd64.tar.gz`

3. Create a Symlink

Create a symlink to bin/quarto in a folder that is in your path. 

`ln -s ~/opt/quarto-1.5.57/bin/quarto ~/.local/bin/quarto`

4. Check The Installation

Use quarto check to confirm that the installation is successful:

`quarto check`
